description: John Schwartz, a New York Times reporter who covers climate change and the environment, is answering reader questions about the storm.
title: Ask the Eye: Hurricane Matthew
title_page: Ask the Eye: Hurricane Matthew - The New York Times
text:
John Schwartz, a New York Times reporter who covers climate change and the environment, is answering reader questions about the storm.
John rode out his first hurricane, Carla, in his hometown of Galveston, Tex., at the age of 4. He has covered the aftermath of Katrina, as well as other storms for The Times.
Follow him on Twitter: @jswatz.
